file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  description: |
    ### NCBI Datasets is a resource that lets you easily gather data from NCBI.
    The Datasets API is still in alpha, and we're updating it often to add new functionality, iron out bugs and enhance usability.
    For some larger downloads, you may want to download a [dehydrated bag](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/docs/v1/how-tos/genomes/large-download/), and retrieve the individual data files at a later time.
  title: NCBI Datasets API
  version: v1
externalDocs:
  description: Interactively explore genome assembly datasets
  url: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genomes/
servers:
- url: https://api.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/v1
- url: https://dev.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/v1
security:
- ApiKeyAuthHeader: []
tags:
- description: |
    #### Options to explore, summarize and download assembled genomes, including the associated sequence, metadata and annotation.
    These genome services allow you to explore [assembled genomes](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/docs/v1/reference-docs/gca-and-gcf-explained/).  For a set of genomes of interest, identified by either assembly accession or taxonomic subtree, you can generate a summary, determine the package size, and download.
  name: Genome
- description: |
    #### Options to explore, summarize and download sequences and metadata for genes and their associated transcripts and proteins.
    These gene services allow you explore [NCBI Gene](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene/), and for genes of interest, identified by either gene-id, symbol or RefSeq sequence accession, download a data package including metadata (tabular and [JSON Lines](https://jsonlines.org/) formats), transcript and protein sequence in FASTA format.
  name: Gene
- description: |
    #### Options to explore, summarize and download sequences and metadata for prokaryote genes and their associated proteins.
    These gene services allow you to explore prokaryotic gene data by RefSeq protein sequence accession and download a data package including metadata for the gene including all genomic annotations as [JSON Lines](https://jsonlines.org/) format, gene and protein sequences in FASTA format.
  name: Prokaryote
- description: |
    #### Get metadata or a zip archive containing a coronavirus genome or protein dataset.
    The following files are optionally available for coronavirus genome and/or protein datasets:
    * genomic.fna (genomic sequences in FASTA format)
    * cds.fna (nucleotide coding sequences in FASTA format)
    * protein.faa (protein sequences in FASTA format)

    The following files are always included in coronavirus genome and protein datasets:
    * data_report.jsonl (data report with viral metadata in JSON lines format)
    * virus_dataset.md (README containing details on sequence file data content and other information)
    * dataset_catalog.json (a list of files and file types included in the dataset)
    You may also request a tab-delimited table of metadata that describes the available coronavirus genome and protein data.
    Coronavirus genome datasets are available for all taxa in the Coronaviridae family, including SARS-CoV-2. Various parameters may be used for filtering and specifying the contents of the genome dataset.
    Protein datasets are available for SARS-CoV-2 only.
  name: Virus
- description: "#### Retrieve the current version of all services.  \nServices follow\
    \ [Semantic Versioning 2.0.0 Schema](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).\n"
  name: Version
- description: |
    #### Options to explore taxonomic metadata and relationships.
    These taxonomic services allow you to browse taxonomic metadata in addition to retrieving parent lineages and filtered sets of child nodes for any given set of taxonomic identifiers.
  name: Taxonomy
paths:
  /genome/accession/{accessions}:
    get:
      description: Get detailed metadata for assembled genomes by accession in a JSON
        output format.
      operationId: assembly_descriptors_by_accessions
      parameters:
      - examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Human and Mouse
            value:
            - GCF_000001405.40
            - GCF_000001635.27
          example-1:
            summary: Human
            value: GCF_000001405.40
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accessions
        required: true
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: simple
      - description: If true, only return reference and representative (GCF_ and GCA_)
          genome assemblies.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to reference & representative genomes
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Include reference and non-reference genomes
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.reference_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Return only RefSeq (GCF_) or GenBank (GCA_) genome assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to RefSeq genomes
            value: refseq
          example-1:
            summary: Limit to GenBank genomes
            value: genbank
          example-2:
            summary: All genomes
            value: all
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_source
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblySource'
        style: form
      - description: Return only annotated genome assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to annotated assemblies
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Return all assemblies
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.has_annotation
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: If true, exclude atypical genomes, i.e. genomes that have assembly
          issues or are otherwise atypical
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Return all selected genomes, including ones that are atypical
            value: false
          example-1:
            summary: Only return genomes that have not been classified as atypical
            value: true
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.exclude_atypical
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that have one of the specified
          assembly levels. By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Chromosome and complete genome
            value:
            - chromosome
            - complete_genome
          example-1:
            summary: Scaffold and higher
            value:
            - scaffold
            - chromosome
            - complete_genome
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_level
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblyLevel'
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that were released on or after
          the specified date By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Jan 10, 2015
            value: 01/10/2015
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.first_release_date
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that were released on or before
          to the specified date By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Jan 10, 2021
            value: 01/10/2021
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.last_release_date
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return results whose fields contain the specified search
          terms in their taxon, infraspecific, assembly name or submitter fields By
          default, do not filter
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Genome Reference Consortium
            value: Genome Reference Consortium
          example-1:
            summary: GRCh38
            value: GRCh38
          example-2:
            summary: C57BL/6J
            value: C57BL/6J
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.search_text
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: The maximum number of genome assemblies to return. Default is
          20 and maximum is 1000. If the number of results exceeds the page size,
          `page_token` can be used to retrieve the remaining results.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: page_size
        required: false
        schema:
          default: 20
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: A page token is returned from an `AssemblyMetadataRequest` call
          with more than `page_size` results. Use this token, along with the previous
          `AssemblyMetadataRequest` parameters, to retrieve the next page of results.
          When `page_token` is empty, all results have been retrieved.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: page_token
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadata'
          description: A successful response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/rpcStatus'
          description: An unexpected error response.
      summary: Get genome metadata by accession
      tags:
      - Genome
  /genome/taxon/{taxon}:
    get:
      description: Get detailed metadata on all assembled genomes for a specified
        NCBI Taxonomy ID or name (common or scientific) at any taxonomic rank.
      operationId: assembly_descriptors_by_taxon
      parameters:
      - description: NCBI Taxonomy ID or name (common or scientific) at any taxonomic
          rank
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: NCBI Taxonomy Identifier
            value: 9606
          example-1:
            summary: Common Name
            value: human
          example-2:
            summary: Scientific Name
            value: Homo sapiens
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: taxon
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: If true, only return reference and representative (GCF_ and GCA_)
          genome assemblies.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to reference & representative genomes
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Include reference and non-reference genomes
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.reference_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Return only RefSeq (GCF_) or GenBank (GCA_) genome assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to RefSeq genomes
            value: refseq
          example-1:
            summary: Limit to GenBank genomes
            value: genbank
          example-2:
            summary: All genomes
            value: all
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_source
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblySource'
        style: form
      - description: Return only annotated genome assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to annotated assemblies
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Return all assemblies
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.has_annotation
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: For paired (GCA/GCF) records, only return the primary record
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Return all assemblies
            value: false
          example-1:
            summary: Only return single record for GCA/GCF pairs
            value: true
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.exclude_paired_reports
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: If true, exclude atypical genomes, i.e. genomes that have assembly
          issues or are otherwise atypical
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Return all selected genomes, including ones that are atypical
            value: false
          example-1:
            summary: Only return genomes that have not been classified as atypical
            value: true
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.exclude_atypical
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Return all assemblies, including replaced and suppressed, or
          only current assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Only return current assemblies
            value: current
          example-1:
            summary: Return all assemblies, including suppressed and replaced
            value: all_assemblies
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_version
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblyVersion'
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that have one of the specified
          assembly levels. By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Chromosome and complete genome
            value:
            - chromosome
            - complete_genome
          example-1:
            summary: Scaffold and higher
            value:
            - scaffold
            - chromosome
            - complete_genome
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_level
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblyLevel'
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that were released on or after
          the specified date By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Jan 10, 2015
            value: 01/10/2015
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.first_release_date
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that were released on or before
          to the specified date By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Jan 10, 2021
            value: 01/10/2021
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.last_release_date
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return results whose fields contain the specified search
          terms in their taxon, infraspecific, assembly name or submitter fields By
          default, do not filter
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Genome Reference Consortium
            value: Genome Reference Consortium
          example-1:
            summary: GRCh38
            value: GRCh38
          example-2:
            summary: C57BL/6J
            value: C57BL/6J
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.search_text
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: If true, only return assemblies with the given NCBI Taxonomy
          ID, or name. Otherwise, assemblies from taxonomy subtree are included, too.
          Ignored for assembly_accession request.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: tax_exact_match
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Return either assembly accessions, or entire assembly-metadata
          records
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: returned_content
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadataRequestContentType'
        style: form
      - description: The maximum number of genome assemblies to return. Default is
          20 and maximum is 1000. If the number of results exceeds the page size,
          `page_token` can be used to retrieve the remaining results.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: page_size
        required: false
        schema:
          default: 20
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: A page token is returned from an `AssemblyMetadataRequest` call
          with more than `page_size` results. Use this token, along with the previous
          `AssemblyMetadataRequest` parameters, to retrieve the next page of results.
          When `page_token` is empty, all results have been retrieved.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: page_token
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadata'
          description: A successful response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/rpcStatus'
          description: An unexpected error response.
      summary: Get genome metadata by taxonomic identifier
      tags:
      - Genome
  /genome/bioproject/{accessions}:
    get:
      description: Get detailed metadata for assembled genomes by bioproject accession
        in a JSON output format.
      operationId: assembly_descriptors_by_bioproject
      parameters:
      - examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Vertebrate Genomes Project
            value: PRJNA489243
          example-1:
            summary: Human Genome Project
            value: PRJNA31257
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accessions
        required: true
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: simple
      - description: If true, only return reference and representative (GCF_ and GCA_)
          genome assemblies.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to reference & representative genomes
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Include reference and non-reference genomes
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.reference_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Return only RefSeq (GCF_) or GenBank (GCA_) genome assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to RefSeq genomes
            value: refseq
          example-1:
            summary: Limit to GenBank genomes
            value: genbank
          example-2:
            summary: All genomes
            value: all
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_source
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblySource'
        style: form
      - description: Return only annotated genome assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to annotated assemblies
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Return all assemblies
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.has_annotation
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: For paired (GCA/GCF) records, only return the primary record
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Return all assemblies
            value: false
          example-1:
            summary: Only return single record for GCA/GCF pairs
            value: true
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.exclude_paired_reports
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: If true, exclude atypical genomes, i.e. genomes that have assembly
          issues or are otherwise atypical
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Return all selected genomes, including ones that are atypical
            value: false
          example-1:
            summary: Only return genomes that have not been classified as atypical
            value: true
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.exclude_atypical
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Return all assemblies, including replaced and suppressed, or
          only current assemblies
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Only return current assemblies
            value: current
          example-1:
            summary: Return all assemblies, including suppressed and replaced
            value: all_assemblies
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_version
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblyVersion'
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that have one of the specified
          assembly levels. By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Chromosome and complete genome
            value:
            - chromosome
            - complete_genome
          example-1:
            summary: Scaffold and higher
            value:
            - scaffold
            - chromosome
            - complete_genome
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.assembly_level
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyDatasetDescriptorsFilterAssemblyLevel'
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that were released on or after
          the specified date By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Jan 10, 2015
            value: 01/10/2015
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.first_release_date
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return genome assemblies that were released on or before
          to the specified date By default, do not filter.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Jan 10, 2021
            value: 01/10/2021
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.last_release_date
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return results whose fields contain the specified search
          terms in their taxon, infraspecific, assembly name or submitter fields By
          default, do not filter
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Genome Reference Consortium
            value: Genome Reference Consortium
          example-1:
            summary: GRCh38
            value: GRCh38
          example-2:
            summary: C57BL/6J
            value: C57BL/6J
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: filters.search_text
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: Return either assembly accessions, or entire assembly-metadata
          records
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: returned_content
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadataRequestContentType'
        style: form
      - description: The maximum number of genome assemblies to return. Default is
          20 and maximum is 1000. If the number of results exceeds the page size,
          `page_token` can be used to retrieve the remaining results.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: page_size
        required: false
        schema:
          default: 20
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: A page token is returned from an `AssemblyMetadataRequest` call
          with more than `page_size` results. Use this token, along with the previous
          `AssemblyMetadataRequest` parameters, to retrieve the next page of results.
          When `page_token` is empty, all results have been retrieved.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: page_token
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadata'
          description: A successful response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/rpcStatus'
          description: An unexpected error response.
      summary: Get genome metadata by bioproject accession
      tags:
      - Genome
  /genome:
    post:
      description: Get detailed metadata for assembled genomes.
      operationId: genome_metadata_by_post
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            example:
              accessions:
                accessions:
                - GCF_000001405.40
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadataRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1AssemblyMetadata'
          description: A successful response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/rpcStatus'
          description: An unexpected error response.
      summary: Get genome metadata by variety of identifiers
      tags:
      - Genome
  /genome/taxon/{taxon}/tree:
    get:
      description: Using a NCBI Taxonomy ID or name (common or scientific) at any
        rank, get a subtree filtered for species with assembled genomes.
      operationId: genome_tax_tree
      parameters:
      - description: NCBI Taxonomy ID or name (common or scientific) at any taxonomic
          rank
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: NCBI Taxonomy Identifier
            value: 9606
          example-1:
            summary: Common Name
            value: human
          example-2:
            summary: Scientific Name
            value: Homo sapiens
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: taxon
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Only report the children of the requested taxon and not their
          descendants
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: children_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1Organism'
          description: A successful response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/rpcStatus'
          description: An unexpected error response.
      summary: Get a taxonomic subtree by taxonomic identifier
      tags:
      - Genome
  /genome/taxon_suggest/{taxon_query}:
    get:
      description: This endpoint retrieves a list of taxonomy names and IDs found
        in the assembly dataset given a partial taxonomic name of any rank.
      operationId: genome_tax_name_query
      parameters:
      - description: NCBI Taxonomy ID or name (common or scientific) at any taxonomic
          rank
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: hum
            value: hum
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: taxon_query
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Set the scope of searched tax ranks
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: tax_rank_filter
        required: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1OrganismQueryRequestTaxRankFilter'
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/v1SciNameAndIds'
          description: A successful response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/rpcStatus'
          description: An unexpected error response.
      summary: Get a list of taxonomy names and IDs found in the assembly dataset
        given a partial taxonomic name
      tags:
      - Genome
  /genome/accession/{accessions}/download_summary:
    get:
      description: Get a download summary by accession in a JSON output format.
      operationId: genome_download_summary
      parameters:
      - description: NCBI genome assembly accessions
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Human and Mouse
            value:
            - GCF_000001405.40
            - GCF_000001635.27
          example-1:
            summary: Human
            value: GCF_000001405.40
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accessions
        required: true
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: simple
      - description: The default setting is all chromosome. Specify individual chromosome
          by string (1,2,MT or chr1,chr2.chrMT). Unplaced sequences are treated like
          their own chromosome ('Un'). The filter only applies to fasta sequence.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Selected chromosomes
            value:
            - 1
            - 2
            - 3
            - X
            - "Y"

    get:

        examples:

            summary: Coronaviridae
            value: 11118

            summary: MERS
            value: 1335626

          type: string

          example-0:
            summary: Limit to RefSeq genomes
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Both GenBank & RefSeq genomes
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: refseq_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: If true, limit results to annotated genomes.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to annotated genomes
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: All genomes
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: annotated_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: If set, limit results to viral genomes that have been released
          after a specified date (and optionally, time). April 1, 2020 midnight UTC
          should be formatted as '2020-04-01T00:00:00.000Z'
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: August 1, 2020
            value: 2020-08-01
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: released_since
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: If set, limit results to genomes extracted from this host (Taxonomy
          ID or name) All hosts by default
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: human
            value: human
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: host
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: If set, limit results to genomes classified to this lineage by
          the PangoLearn tool.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: pangolin_classification
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Assemblies from this location (country and state, or continent)
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: USA
            value: USA
          example-1:
            summary: Texas
            value: TX
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: geo_location
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: only include complete genomes.
        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Limit to complete genomes
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: All genomes
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: complete_only
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Set to true to omit the genomic sequence.

          example-0:
            summary: Exclude genomic sequence
            value: true
          example-1:
            summary: Include genomic sequence
            value: false
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: exclude_sequence
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Select additional types of annotation to include in the data

        examples:
          example-0:
            summary: Transcript sequence
            value: CDS_FASTA

            summary: All annotation

        explode: true
        in: query
        name: include_annotation_type
        required: false
